channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 观看：直觉机器公司（Intuitive Machines）称其奥德修斯号（Odysseus）月球着陆器发生倾覆，公司股价随之下跌超过30%。
item.description:
WATCH: Intuitive Machines said its Odysseus moon lander had tipped over and took its share value with it, falling more than 30% https://t.co/QjtA7iWYMz pic.twitter.com/fyBMsLdlxu

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 随着经济和地缘政治困境刺激投资者纷纷撤离中国，许多人将资金转投日本，使基准日经指数在飙升至历史高位时获得额外的推动力。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
As economic and geopolitical woes spur an exodus of investors from China, many have been redirecting money into Japan, giving the benchmark Nikkei an extra boost as it rockets to all-time highs. More here: https://t.co/JQp4t7tF17

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 巴西与最大的气候融资联盟合作促进绿色增长
item.description:
Brazil partners with largest climate finance alliance to boost green growth https://t.co/JXwsUBOkEA pic.twitter.com/raz44J6fOh

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 独家报道StanChart 暂停客户通过中国境外渠道进行新投资
item.description:
Exclusive: StanChart suspends new investments from clients via China outbound channel https://t.co/GFNo18kece pic.twitter.com/Z2UHBF4Vzq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：华尔街股指在人工智能引领的炙热反弹后收盘下跌，投资者正在为本周可能影响美联储降息路径的关键通胀数据做准备
item.description:
WATCH: Wall Street indexes ended lower after a scorching AI-led rally, as investors braced for key inflation data this week that could impact Federal Reserve's rate cut path https://t.co/ZPpu6lDZRf pic.twitter.com/syn4gbTgDh

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：雷诺风景在日内瓦国际车展上被评为年度最佳汽车。 这款 SUV 获得了评委们 329 张选票，这也是雷诺第七次获得这一殊荣。
item.description:
WATCH: The Renault Scenic was voted Car of the Year at the Geneva International Motor Show. The SUV obtained 329 votes from jurors and marks the seventh time that Renault has bagged the coveted trophy pic.twitter.com/7zF8DGSWFu

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）将在本周于巴西圣保罗举行的二十国集团（G20）财政官员会议前的新闻发布会上表示，美国经济的强劲增长是全球经济增长好于预期的 "关键驱动力"。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Strong US economic growth has been a ‘key driver’ of better-than-expected global growth, US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen will tell a news conference ahead of this week's meeting of G20 finance officials in Sao Paulo, Brazil. More here: https://t.co/lVa26T7VRm

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 中国科技公司荣耀（Honor）在全球发布了新款 Magic 6 Pro 智能手机，并展示了实验性的眼球追踪人工智能功能，用户只需注视手机屏幕，就能远程打开和移动汽车。更多信息，请点击此处：
item.description:
Chinese technology company Honor globally launched its new Magic 6 Pro smartphone and showcased an experimental eye-tracking AI function that enables users to remotely open and move their car just by looking at their phone screen. More here: https://t.co/e2ILoHxcYs pic.twitter.com/9XWs75ndf3

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会和八个州正在提起诉讼，要求阻止连锁超市克罗格以 246 亿美元收购较小竞争对手 Albertsons 的交易，称这将提高数百万美国人的食品杂货价格。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The US Federal Trade Commission and eight states are suing to block supermarket chain Kroger's $24.6 billion deal to buy smaller rival Albertsons, saying it would boost grocery prices for millions of Americans. More here: https://t.co/eSauZDH5yi

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：看看这个使用 #AI 回应请求的虚拟助理
item.description:

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：美国股市在经历了上周人工智能推动的反弹后小幅收跌。道指小幅收跌，标普 500 指数收跌近万分之四，纳斯达克指数小幅收跌。
item.description:
WATCH: US stocks ended slightly lower after last week's AI-fueled rally. The Dow finished marginally lower, the S&P 500 ended down almost four tenths of a percent while the Nasdaq ended down fractionally https://t.co/ZPpu6lDZRf pic.twitter.com/KqFgXlb2rr

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 27, 2024

item.title: 中国科技公司荣耀（Honor）展示了一项实验性的眼球追踪人工智能功能，用户只需看着手机屏幕，就能远程打开和移动汽车。更多信息
item.description:
Chinese technology company Honor showcased an experimental eye-tracking AI function that enables users to remotely open and move their car just by looking at their phone screen. Read more: https://t.co/e2ILoHwF8U pic.twitter.com/pRxWgB77pP

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：由于勉强持有被冻结的俄罗斯资产，布鲁塞尔清算所的资产负债表已经膨胀。@rebeccawire 认为，这有助于利润和分红，但金融稳定的威胁迫在眉睫。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: The Brussels-based clearing house has seen its balance sheet swell thanks to the frozen Russian assets it reluctantly holds. That’s helping profits and dividends but that financial stability threats loom, @rebeccawire argues pic.twitter.com/KCrnHcZ9Ep

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 26, 2024
